SELECT r.report_no AS reportNo, r.report_title AS reportTitle, r.report_content AS reportContent, r.report_memo AS reportMemo, r.member_id AS memberId, r.member_item_no AS memberItemNo, i.member_item_title AS memberItemTitle, r.report_state AS reportState, r.report_date AS reportDate FROM mini_market_report_m_by_mitem r INNER JOIN mini_market_member_item i ON r.member_item_no = i.member_item_no WHERE report_state LIKE CONCAT('%',#{reportState},'%') ORDER BY r.report_state ASC, report_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT r.report_no AS reportNo, r.report_title AS reportTitle, r.report_content AS reportContent, r.report_memo AS reportMemo, r.member_id AS memberId, r.member_item_no AS memberItemNo, i.member_item_title AS memberItemTitle, r.report_state AS reportState, r.report_date AS reportDate FROM mini_market_report_m_by_mitem r INNER JOIN mini_market_member_item i ON r.member_item_no = i.member_item_no WHERE report_no = #{reportNo}
